attributes.action: ensure that Neal Salvage isn't allowed to use his cheap electric chainsaw without proper supervision from someone with half a brain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having blown the mighty amount of £50 on an electric chainsaw Mr Savage now believes he has the qualifications of a tree surgeon. We the undersigned petition Tony Blair to pass a law stopping him from doing himself and probably his kids some serious damage.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
